channel.title: Distributed Systems on nRT
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed Systems on nRT

item.title: Distributed Systems Resources
item.description: I started working on distributed systems in early 2016. Given that I had little to no background, I started trying to cover as much as possible from the literature out there. In this (dynamically updated) post, I intend to keep track of all good resources I come across in this quest. This includes not only research papers and books, but also good blogs, people to follow and discussions/meetups that could be helpful.
